titlecard.heading: For when you need a reminder

card.note: Mom, you inspire me every day, and have helped me become the person I will be today and into the future. I can only hope to be as caring, patient, and loving as you are. I'll love you forever; I'll like you for always; as long as I'm living my mommy you'll be. xoxo
card.author: Chandler

card.note: You are an enjoyable person to be around. Time spent with you is priceless. Even though we met by a special circumstance, I am happy to have you in my life. Happy Birthday my dear friend! Be always healthy, happy and of course wealthy! I hug you and kiss you!!
card.author: Anna Haroutunian

card.note: I have always loved that Renee is a TRUE Friend and I can always count on her positive, can do attitude...I truly enjoy her company and I am a better person because of her friendship. Happy Birthday my long-time friend!
card.author: Robbie Ruiz

card.note: One thing I like most about Renee is that she always has a smile on her face and she always says....."Its ALL good". She's been a blessing to have in my life and I consider her a wonderful friend.
card.author: With Love, Dee Dee Turpin

card.note: I love you style, independence and friendship. Happy Birthday.
card.author: Holly Dutton

card.note: I Love Renee! She is so thoughtful and a really good friend about staying in touch.
card.author: Kathy Vicars

card.note: One of the many things I like about Renee is... Her positivity. I'm always more peaceful after our conversations. I love how, in any situation, whether it's frustrating, scary, or sad, Renee helps me see the bigger picture and how I will grow from it.
card.author: Christine Rawson

card.note: Her shoes! /RHer handbags!/RI love Renee's taste /Rand sense of style. /R/R
card.author: Rebecca Rawson

card.note: Renee is witty, charming, kind, supportive and a dear friend to me and many others. In short, I love her and cherish our friendship.
card.author: Marg

card.note: Beautiful inside and out, smart but not arrogant, a wonderful friend! You are loved and respected by all who know you.
card.author: Paddy Reynolds

card.note: It would be imposable to say only ONE thing. There is so much I love about this Woman. Her kindness, understanding, work ethic, family values, sense of humor, loyalty are just a few. She is however quite selfish! She won't give me my cat!
card.author: Jennifer Hews

card.note: P. Renee/R/RPositive/RResponsible/REnergetic/RNegotiator/RExtraordinary/RExtra Special/R/RMy Sister ! My Mentor !/RI Love You !/RBeckie
card.author: Beckie

card.note: What an amazing role model you have been for our daughter....and a loving and caring wife/friend to me for all of these years. /R/RHappy Birthday Renee!
card.author: Steve

card.note: One thing I love most about you is they way you make me smile when I've had a bad day.
card.author: Chandler

card.note: One thing I love most about you is your amazing ability to come up with creative dinners every night ;)
card.author: Chandler

card.note: Your relentless pursuit of a healthy lifestyle inspires us. Your big heart inspires concern for all you encounter. You are devoted to your loving daughter as well as those two feisty felines who rule the household. Surely happiness will follow you in the future.
card.author: Michael Russell

card.note: Whew, were does one begin when writing about one of the most dear and influential people in your life. Your strength has always been top of the list (even above style & smarts) of what I admire about you. Proud to be your friend.
card.author: love you always, Gina Harpur

card.note: (Card #2) /RSpeaking of style... you looked way hotter than me in Dittos!!
card.author: your jealous friend, Gina Harpur

card.note: You challenge me to be my best self everyday, and you are always there to support me when I need it.
card.author: xoxo Chandler

card.note: You are there to pick me up when I fall, as well as when I succeed. You support me unconditionally, and that inspires me.
card.author: Chandler

card.note: No matter how much I hate to say it, you have taught me that "This too, shall pass." This has been one of the most important reminders to myself on a day to day basis.
card.author: Chandler

card.note: Renee, Happy Birthday to a beautiful lady who has charm, grace, intelligence, drive and is a pleasure to be with. I hope this is your best year yet and that you enjoy your birthday with all your loved ones. I am honored to be your friend,
card.author: Adrienne

card.note: Renee is a kind and generous friend. She is always there to listen without judgment. I treasure our friendship and what a beautiful person she is, inside and out. Happy Birthday!
card.author: Carrie Rognlien

card.note: The one thing I like most about Renee is everything. As a young girl you knew what you wanted and you went for it and I think the results are amazing. You have very high standards and keep them. The daughter you raised is fantastic! The life you live says it all. Dad
card.author: Bill Hembree

card.note: You can make me laugh even when we are 3,000 miles apart. xoxo
card.author: Chandler

card.note: The Renee Cocktail:/R3 cups of Sweetness/R1 tsp of Kindness/R2 Tsp Elegance & Good Taste/R1 cup of Intellect/R2 cups of Playfulness/R1 1/2 of Flirtation/R1 tsp Boldness/R6 oz. of Courage/RAdd a heaping of Laughter/RBlend with ice and sip slowly on the beach..(smile)/R
card.author: A Mixologist

card.note: Renee understands the power of a good question:/R/R"Do you want me to listen, or do you want my advice?"/R/R"Do you want to be happy, or do you want to be right?"
card.author: Keith

card.note: You allow everything in life to take place and be a part of life but not get hung up on things and let them clog your heart. You have chosen to be happy, and have enriched the lives of those of us fortunate enough to know you.
card.author: A Casual Observer

card.note: You're awed by nature and some of your best days are those spent outdoors. You can see the best in things and appreciate the details in nature; from a changing sunset, to the color of the sea, to the fragrance of a flower.
card.author: Winnedumah

card.note: Although sometimes you forget this is my house, you always sit with me on the stairs to purr and make me feel like the queen I deserve to be. In the mornings we always purr, which is my favorite purr of the day. You are loving and you care that my water glass stays full
card.author: M

card.note: I love the times when I get to sit in your lap and sneak my paws in between your thighs when you nap. I love that you make me feel safe when I am scared. I love that you feed me mountains of tuna. And I especially love it when you feed me before 6pm.
card.author: Q

card.note: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." - The Help/RYou are all of these in their truest form./RI love you!
card.author: Chandler

card.note: The Renee Cake/R1.5 cups unconditional love/R2 cups sweetness/R4 Tbsp laughs/R1 tsp sass/R2 Tbsp determination/RFrost with buckets of chocolate frosting./RSit back. Cut a piece. Smile.
card.author: Chandler
